item.title: Huge Free webhost list!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

I can see you’ve put some effort into it by copying all that stuff, but it’s not helpful. Nobody, not even Einstein, would browse to such a list. For a list to be useful one would have to list some pro’s and cons.

Not only that but there are 100’s of websites devoted to listing free hosts.

Read full topic
